data.title: Office of Employee Relations
data.meta_description: List of Employee Assistance Program Coordinators
data.text:
An Employee Assistance Program (EAP) coordinator will meet with you in person or by phone to assess your situation, provide you with referrals to community resources, and follow up with you to see how you are doing and if you need any additional assistance. If you prefer to contact an EAP coordinator from an agency other than your own, you may choose any EAP coordinator from the list of statewide EAP coordinators below.

Employee Assistance Program Coordinators List
